data.message: Thanks Facebook for keeping me in touch with my family and Friends !

replies.message: Yes Facebook keeps me with my friends and family 3000 miles away.
Thank you facebook. Its been quite rewarding.
Thank you FB that was nice. Will we also get to do our year in review again?
Loved being able to do our year ! I vote yes
Thx you fb almost Happy New Year 🎆🎉
I was visiting Paris the night of the attacks. It was such a surprise to have Facebook prompt me to notify my family and friends that I was safe.  They were all so relieved!
What about the San Bernardino shooting?? You can't forget those victims Facebook...
Learn how to use a phone.

Hey there, Michael. Thanks for your comment. All of our lists look at conversation from January 1 through December 1, 2015. Therefore, San Bernardino was not taken into account for the Global Top Topics list we're releasing on December 9. -Jordan
We're still in 2015 maybe you should add it...just saying 😀

David Rayome not everyone can afford a cell phone plan . but may have net . and the go visit someone comment  well mister let me tell you something . i for one am disabled and cant just go visit anyone. i have to have someone take me where i need to go and help me when i do get a ride . i would love to be able to go visit people . and with facebook i kind of can . there are many reasons why a person cant or doesnt just go visit or call someone. not everyone is as perfect as you seem to be
